channel.title: News on Wales Gene Park
channel.description: Recent content in News on Wales Gene Park

item.title: Major Funding Boost for Genetic Research
item.description: Wales Gene Park receives significant funding to advance genetic research projects.

item.title: New Patient Support Network Launched
item.description: Wales Gene Park launches a new support network for patients with genetic conditions.

item.title: Annual Genomics Conference Announced
item.description: Wales Gene Park to host its annual genomics conference in Cardiff this November.

item.title: Breakthrough in Gene Discovery
item.description: Scientists at Wales Gene Park have identified a new gene linked to rare genetic disorders.
